website_summaries.verdict: This polycarbonate box floats, so it's a good choice for your small valuables when you're fishing or kayaking.
pros: Protects contents from moisture, dirt, dust and sand
Intended for use during boating, fishing, kayaking, camping and other activities
Do not fully submerse in water
Easy to clip to straps or backpack
Large box stores fish finder batteries
cons: Gasket can dry out over time and fail, so be sure to check it

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Decent solid box. Not the quality of Plano or other higher priced watertight boxes but, for the cheap price, definitely a solid buy. Holds my kayak 12V battery (fishfinder) perfect and secure with a little room to spare. Get the large box if you want to store a small fish finder battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kennybor24

customer_reviews.title: Seal not so good
customer_reviews.text: Item works great until the gasket dries out. Had a few of these units in the past year. On everyone I owned, the gasket either decomposed or dried out, making the seal useless but still functional as a storage container. I would strongly suggest using a different material for the gasket seal.
customer_reviews.author: ton

customer_reviews.title: Watertight
customer_reviews.text: I keeps your small items dry when you're in the kayak cuz I have to say everything else gets wet
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beauchene

customer_reviews.title: Gasket Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Used to protect some electrical connections on a small boat transom. Originally worked fine, but the gasket turned gooey after 3 years, making the box unusable. It was never exposed to salt water, in fact rarely got wet. Was under storage cover for 20 months so saw no weather at all other than outdoor temp changes. Probably OK for a use were you can keep an eye on it but probably not for longer term storage. Will try a Pelican box instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lenski99

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but can be very difficult to open with elevation change
customer_reviews.text: I loved this case for many years and used it for my first aid kit, but then I went to somewhat high elevations a couple different times (Olympic National Park and Mount Rainier National Park) and had a really hard time getting it open the first time and then a nearly impossible time the second time... I tried and failed for a solid hour and then finally got it open after using a blow dryer to heat it up inside. That just doesn't work for me, especially for my first aid kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina W

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Got the box one day, took it out kayak fishing the next with all my valuables in it. Unfortunately, I got to test it out a bit sooner than I would have liked because I managed to flip my kayak over. This box was submerged for at least 5 minutes and everything was nice and dry upon inspection. The plastic quality is a bit ridged so I doubt it would stand up to any rough handling but, for the price, it exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Austin tx

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Safe-box
customer_reviews.text: These water tight boxes are a must have for any adventure. I like this product because it is bright orange in color and completely waterproof. I put things like my keys, wallet, etc. in these boxes and stop worrying if anything were to fall into the ice hole or take a plunge in a lake because they float! These boxes also have a tether strap so you can hook them onto a molle strap or clip them to a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good watertight box
customer_reviews.text: I used this as an enclosure for data loggers installed in a couple very rainy tropical sites. They performed marvelously: 9 months in the field and bone-dry on the inside. If you abuse it, you can break the gray plastic snaps that hold it shut. (Can't blame the manufacturer for that...plastic is plastic and can break if abused.) But, it seems to stay pretty dry on the inside even with one snap broken!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this a low rating is because it came stickers all over the box. When I peeled the stickers off they left a goofy residue all of the box. I tried using sponges and paper towels to get it off, but it’s become an inconvenience .
customer_reviews.author: Olive12345

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I reordered large box going off listed dimensions and they are so very wrong. At first I thought I got the small then realized after the second one came in that I had received the correct box - it's just falsely advertised. My battery cannot fit in this so I'm gonna have to go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Devin V.

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are incorrect for the blue model
customer_reviews.text: Description says: 3.25 x 5.25 x 6.75 By my measurement, it is 3.25 x 4.25 x 5.875 I gave it 2 stars because I have to order another, larger one for the application I had in mind (battery box). edit: Ok, the description when you scroll down shows the difference, but the one at the top does not. Still misleading work by the seller, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not so water tight.
customer_reviews.text: One of the latches the pin would not stay so it kept sliding over or coming out making it impossible to latch easily and eventually falling out and getting lost. Now not being able to latch both sides means it is no longer a water tight sealed water box, useless to us now after only being used 5 times and we are at the lake at least once or twice a week in the summer. The last box we had looked similar and lasted us over 3 years, unfortunately the kids broke the old one or we would still have it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight fishing box.
customer_reviews.text: This box can be used for all kinds of things, but I use it as a battery box for my fish finder battery in my kayak. Never submersed it yet, but the seal and clamps make a tight fit. I've used other Outdoor Products and their products seem pretty decently made and designed.
customer_reviews.author: brai

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs fine!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this box for an outdoor battery powering a trail camera. Plenty of room for the battery and 12v-to-6v converter. I've also fit a solar charger/controller in it and I can read the display on the solar charger/controller.
customer_reviews.author: DaveReadsALot

customer_reviews.title: Nice box
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a protective box for a pump controller outdoors. I drilled a couple holes to accommodate the cords. I was a bit concerned because the holes were fairly large and close together, but the box held up nicely. Quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, waterproof, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, tight lid, colorful. I can now carry my phone, smokes, etc. out on the lake with no worries. The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I work outside in Florida in the villages and we get short but heavy rain and I needed a way to protect chargers, cables, and batteries. These are great just don't overfill them as it'll damage the latches.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy V. Babson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Secure Seal
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, purchased this to build a waterproof battery box for my kayak fish finder. Haven’t had it on the water yet but it looks good anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mjm579

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER!!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our most recent camping trip. total lifesaver! compact and ideal for a camping scenario. totally recommend this for hiking into the campsite or a simple drive up and park campsite!
customer_reviews.author: gus oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Great little box
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a travel vape case for my ejuice and hardware. Holds my usual (3) 30ml bottles, extra tanks, batteries, and misc vape supplies with no problems and room to spare. It's just the right size for a few day outing or 8 day cruise. Tsa has never given me any issues with this case on my carry on and it works great as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep all my documents inside my boat... occasionally see moisture got in but for the most part it does it’s job- my registration and insurance card is certainly better off in this then just inside a compartment
customer_reviews.author: alissa

customer_reviews.title: Broke After One Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a river rafting weekend. The lock and seal broke half way through the day. Thankfully my phone stayed dry, but that was with much care that I didn't want to do. Hence why I purchased. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stinky smells INSIDE
customer_reviews.text: I use have not used it for water protection. I do use it for odor protection. I keep stinky things inside of it and it keeps the smell contained! It is a miracle worker and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are interior
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions appear to be exterior not interior. 5 1/2" x 4" x 3" is the correct interior dimension. Guess they sell more this way. Get you to buy the small one thinking it will work and then when you receive it, NOPE. Gotta get a large one. I'll try and remember to put a review on it with correct interior size. Box seems to be what I am looking for if it would have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little box
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little box. Inbought it for my phone for my paddle board. The dimension listed are outside dimensions. Inside dimensions are 5-1/2" x 4" x 2". Doesnt fit my phone unless its put on an angle corner to corner. It does the job however and cant really complain. Seems very well made and snaps shut tight.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great box but the finish is ruined because of the label sticker label.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a box like this before and it’s great to take on water trips. It’s big enough for phones and keys to keep dry while on the water. My only complaint is that when you receive it, it has a sticker on top that doesn’t peel off easily. I have made several different attempts to remove the glue. I am now left with the top being covered in a sticky glue and the finish being extremely cloudy. I don’t know why products use that type of sticker that ruins the finish.
customer_reviews.author: RUserious!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is a nice and visible orange. The quality of the container is good. It's sturdy and seals nicely. I used this to store my fish finder battery on my kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Cory K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but still works
customer_reviews.text: One clip broke off the second day I had this box. Outdoor products has good economy-line watertight boxes for non-professional or non-busy use. Not built to last. One clip still holds the box shut well enough for water to not splash in from my canoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: Small - incorrect dimensions
customer_reviews.text: They must be using a faulty ruler. The small is not 3.25 x 5.25 x 6.75 as described but more around 3.25 x 5.0 x 6.5 if you include all the external clips. Internal actual space for storage is around 2.75 x 3.6 x 5.25. Returning this due to faulty advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Klimes

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time buyer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box a while back for my small boat to out all the docs and flares in. It sat there through saltwater and Winters and still works amazing. The quality is top notch. Definitely buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex George

customer_reviews.title: This is a great size for wallets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for wallets, fishing licenses, smaller phones. If you have a larger phone I'd look at the size up. My LG G6 fits in this one but I have to put it in diagonally.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Really watertight
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little box. Water tight and not too big. Thinking about buying another one for my wallet and stuff. This one was used as a battery box on my kayak. Highly recommend...very good quality and very good service.
customer_reviews.author: Paulsbud

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this box and BOTH of the locking clasps broke after a weekend of using it. Kept water out while kayaking but than the clasps broke and it was rendered useless.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rose Honey

customer_reviews.title: Field tested on accident- works great
customer_reviews.text: Dumped my kayak in some unexpected rapids, had my wallet and keys in this case, not a drop of water in. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size kayak fiahing box
customer_reviews.text: I use these as the perfect size for storing certain items you dont want wet on the water. Keeping your lighter and batteries dry. However the latches break after a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: Well worth getting to keep things dry
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these which I use on my kayak to keep my fish finder battery dry and secure and the other to keep my valuables safe.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for kayaking. Great size to hold small essentials and snacks. Nice bright color keeps it visible.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Watertight box for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I needed one of these when I go kayaking to keep my phone protected. It works GREAT! Just what I need and a great size!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. This was not the size I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. This was not the size I needed, but got the bigger size, which worked. For boxes, be sure to clearly put the size dimensions, under what you first see in product description.
customer_reviews.author: 3dogs

customer_reviews.title: Double check dimensions, js
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Gasket surface is wide and deep. No sharp edges. Definitely getting a few more.
customer_reviews.author: w.Biedermann

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Well Sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job floating behind my inner-tube for four hours without any problems. Was dropped multiple times with stuff in it and didn't crack or break. Great little DryBox.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for placing my phone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for placing my phone, keys and dry towels for trips floating down the river. Seals perfectly and never leaked! The only thing that I wasn't expecting was that the actual box is orange but transparent, not solid like in the photo. That didn't bother me though. I just wanted something that would keep my things safe and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Get the bigger one!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but I'm sure the deminsions were there that I just didn't read. If you want to put more than your keys and a couple very small things get the bigger one. My phone doesn't fit in it. (iPhone 6 with case). It will hold my keys, pack of smokes, and a lighter. That's about it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rast

customer_reviews.title: Small box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small dry box to take with me on my seadoo to keep my phone and things dry. This box can fit 2 ihpone 8 pluses, keys, smokes, and more. The dimensions of the box had me worried because it seemed kind of small, but it is a perfect fit for everything I need to take with me!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Best choice to be in the wild
customer_reviews.text: I Can't be happier with this purchase, feels very good, clips feels kind of plastic or weak but are very strong, good design, good small medium size, fits perfect in a hiking small back pack, I recommend this to explorers, hikers, back packers and kayakers.
customer_reviews.author: Mirla Mejia

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: We actually mounted as a small battery holder. Had to drill dome holes and put in grommets to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Finish

customer_reviews.title: Watertight Box poorly made latches break very easily
customer_reviews.text: Use this product maybe 10 times in my last 1 lasted 20 years and bingo that watertight latch broke yesterday very unhappy a complete waste of my money I will not buy one again from you
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kiewiet

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size given
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions are incorrect. 2-3/8" x 3-7/8" x 5-1/2". I hope this helps someone else from ordering the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Ways

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof option for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for a fish finder battery. Seems to work as advertised, though I have not submerged it in water to see how water proof it actually is. I have had it out on my kayak quite a bit though without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: great storage box for beach and diving
customer_reviews.text: Been using at the beach for a week now every day and has worked perfect no broken parts yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent watertight "adventure box". I think this will be worth the money but there are definitely more durable cases out there for more money. That's why I gave it 4 stars. This box is definitely for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Topper03

customer_reviews.title: Held up great on my float trip
customer_reviews.text: Held up great on my float trip; big enough for my iphone 6 and a few other things (lighter, pocket knife, mini sunscreen, small bug spray).
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Exellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use for when kayaking to put keys and other items in.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Durable case
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't show you: this is see-through. For my use case this is very good. This gave me the benefits of a Pelican case at about 1/3 the cost. The OP one also has a far superior latch system.
customer_reviews.author: W. Raper

customer_reviews.title: Makeshift humidore
customer_reviews.text: I use these as humidore cigars Much better than wood box
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I take it with me on the kayak everytime I go out. No water comes is and if I need anything from it, it's easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Saulo Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Works like a treat!
customer_reviews.text: Took this box kayaking all day on the river. My belongings stayed dry the whole time. The orange color is great if your stuff goes overboard--that way you can easily spot it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain again
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful of the size of the unit your buying. It's not their fault you don't check on that before you purchase. I like for a back up and fits my Droid mini. Probably fits the iPhone 5se as well. But check before buying.
customer_reviews.author: nathan payne

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. I can't even. Fit my phone in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than the big box store
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to house the fish finder battery on my kayak. Bought some cheap waterproof glands to run the power cable through and the whole setup works great. They sell much more expensive watertight boxes at the big box stores but this is all you need — for 1/4 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Galen Gidman

customer_reviews.title: Quality. A bit small for 2 people tubing
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A bit too small for 2 people's things while tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Feldewerth

customer_reviews.title: Must have in the water!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has kept everything I have secured and water tight, an essential for being in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Went on a canoeing trip and between the 8 hours of rain and water splashing it from the river it kept everything dry.
customer_reviews.author: Primeuser J

customer_reviews.title: Latch broke first actual use
customer_reviews.text: One of the latches broke in half on my very first kayak outing, Won;t be buying another,
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used this to keep mud and water from getting on my phone when we go mudding. Overall does it’s job .
customer_reviews.author: Akirah

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, waterproof container, BUT beware that the dimensions listed for the box are the VERY outside dimensions counting the locking hubs. The inside dimensions, that really count are 5 1/2 inches long, 4 inches wide, and 2 1/2 inches deep. I bought this to put my cell phone in, and it will NOT fit. The dimensions stated are VERY deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great we take it out on the paddle boards all the time
customer_reviews.author: sharla shore

customer_reviews.title: Always dry, no worries
customer_reviews.text: Love these for kayaking. Never need to worry. The stuff is always kept dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like online picture
customer_reviews.text: looks like it will keep wallet, keys, and phone dry. find out this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get too hot inside in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product for what it’s is but you need understand it’s a colored transparent plastic and I’m the sun, the inside gets hot and overheats everything.
customer_reviews.author: Lubo

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kayaking battery
customer_reviews.text: works awesome holding my kayaking battery for my fish finder.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas W

customer_reviews.title: Good box.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for a survival kit in the back of our Jeep. It's go anywhere any weather type of kit. Seals well and fits quite a bit inside it. Liked it so much bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey B.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Got lots of stuff in it for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Massie

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: I havnt put it in the water yet but it's nice to have a water proof box on the river.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, bright noticeable color, watertight and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest one on the market and works as intended, this is the one to buy. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy enough to open
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I've used it several times for kayaking and boating. I've dropped it from waist high and couple of times, and there were no issues. It's easy enough to open, but pretty much requires two hands.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for kayaks
customer_reviews.text: Great box. I use it in my kayak to keep my wallet, key fob, and gopro batteries from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: TomNeely

customer_reviews.title: Great for boats
customer_reviews.text: Great for the boat to stow phones and wallets. Pretty tough looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Iseedumbpeople

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem that rugged, glue from label suxs to remove.
customer_reviews.author: THube

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting my valuables while in my canoe
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller version but my phone out grew it. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Holdeman

customer_reviews.title: Keep it dry!
customer_reviews.text: Nice box man , keep your stuff clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Portzen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Doesn’t hold an iPhone plus but held a regular iPhone, wallet, keys and our sunscreen. Smaller than expected but works as described. Buy the larger one if you have a big phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn H. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for taking my stash on vacation without odor
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, a little lightweight, but keeps my stash from smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Good dry box
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good box and closes tight. The color is good for on the river and I can carry everything I’ll need in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sagerods

customer_reviews.title: Great for my boat
customer_reviews.text: Bought to water proof my boats first aid kit. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Stout

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Should have bought size bigger as this doesn’t quite fit my iPhone 6 (regular size with otter box).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and in good condition. Liked so well that bought a couple more for my grandkids. Small but thats what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: L. Janie

customer_reviews.title: great dry box
customer_reviews.text: great dry box. I've used It for kayaking for years and It was able to hold my phone, keys, and wallet. The strap that's on It is nice too because you can use a carabiner clip to attach to a bungee chord just in case so It doesn't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built box and sturdy but the dimensions do seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built box and sturdy but the dimensions do seem smaller than advertised. I was hoping to house a 12v battery for my kayak fish finder and I knew according to the dimensions stated it would be tight but it wasn't even close to fitting upon receipt. No biggie, perhaps I can find an alternate use. Cell phone? Well..I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 in a rubber case and I have to angle it just to get it to fit. Not much else can even go in there and so that's a little disappointing. I would return it but the price is cheap enough not to bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient size box that will accommodate most cell phones yet is small enough to be handy in the cockpit of a paddle boat. It has a good seal yet is not difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Actually Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I use this box to store my phone in when I go paddle boarding. It fell off the board into the water, but since it floats I was able to easily retrieve it and my phone was still dry! I am greatly enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth c

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Won't let any water in or let any odors out that are inside. The container is perfect for concealing a smell or making something waterproof. Small enough to throw in a backpack and not have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Not water tight at all
customer_reviews.text: Not at all water tight. Brought in after a storm and it had a good bit of water inside even though it was shut tight and somewhat protected from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit S.

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attention to the Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The box seems fine. The only problem is that the dimensions given are for the outside of the box. The inside dimensions are about an inch and a half smaller than the dimensions shown. The small box is too small to hold an average sized phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Flagler

customer_reviews.title: May work great as intended,  dry in not out.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this case was right for what i needed. Issues i ran into were that the grey latches snapped after a few very short uses. While i was trying to keep liquid in and it was a mild cleaning agent, other people's results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: tauffers

customer_reviews.title: Need to update dimension info
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality is great. I ordered the small sized box and the product dimensions are a bit misleading. Description says the container is 6.4" long, which is accurate if you measure from the furthest point on the outside, but the inside dimension is only 5 1/2". The item I bought this container for is 6". I will just return it and order the large size because overall this is a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Whichard

customer_reviews.title: Durable Waterproof Box
customer_reviews.text: Tight box. High quality plastic. Seals great. Works as it should. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: MKK

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box So Far
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the beach. They look perfect for putting items you collect on the beach in them so they don't get broken. Do not know how well they will work yet. Time will tell this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for keeping things dry.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Purchased as dry boxes for keeping keys, wallets, cell phones dry and safe on my boat. The end game is that you ever have to abandon ship (like a family I picked up out of the water when their boat caught on fire) you just grab this and chuck it overboard to find later (after you get off). The color stands out in the water and can easily be found.
customer_reviews.author: Trying to cut down..on everything.

customer_reviews.title: Bad latches, break easily
customer_reviews.text: Went on three kayaking trips and one lid latch broke after one use and the second broke after 3 uses....light uses too. Now it is useless and I can't return it. Just buy a dry bag...that's what I am going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Outdoor Products Watertight Box
product_meta.description:
Whether you’re fishing, boating, geocaching, or traveling, this compact Watertight Box protects gear, documents, and other valuables from the elements. Wallets stay dry, camera lenses unscratched, and cell phones free from dirt and sand when they’re inside.

Made from translucent, shatterproof polycarbonate, the box has an O-ring closure for a watertight seal. Use the rubber tether key-ring style attachment to clip the box to yourself, your boat, or your backpack, and you won’t have to worry about dropping expensive cameras or phones during your adventure. This box is not intended for climbing, load-bearing use, or full submersion. The Watertight Box comes in the following sizes:

 * Small – 840-milliliter capacity; 3.25 x 5.25 x 6.75 inches
 * Large – 1.5-liter capacity; 3.5 x 6.8 x 8 inches


This product is backed by a manufacturer’s 1-year limited warranty against defects.

Outdoor Products manufactures quality gear for all facets of an adventurous life – including heavy duty frame camping backpacks, waist packs, travel duffles, watertight bags and cases, and outdoor accessories. Started as a department store for outdoor enthusiasts in 1973, Outdoor Products continues to help you pack for all of your work, play, camping, and travel adventures.
feature_bullets: Multipurpose box protects against moisture, dust, dirt, and sand; great for boating, kayaking, fishing, and more
Rubber key clip and strap attachment point; O-ring closure for a watertight seal
Made from shatterproof translucent polycarbonate; small size measures 3.25 x 5.25 x 6.75 inches with 840 ml capacity
Not intended for climbing, load-bearing use, or full submersion
Backed by a manufacturer’s 1-year limited warranty
